roleset.name: to change the direction or course of
roleset.note: REDIRECT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'redirect' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from redirect.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: For the last year , Santa Fe Pacific has redirected its real estate operations toward longer-term development of its properties , [*] hurting profits that the parent had generated [*T*-1]in the past from periodic sales from its portfolio .
example.arg: toward longer-term development of its properties
[*] hurting profits that the parent had generated [*T*-1]in the past from periodic sales from its portfolio
